explains: n. 权力集团，上层人士；尖子，精英
adj. 出类拔萃的，精锐的
wordGroup: elite education 精英教育，英才教育

sentences.en: Power is largely concentrated in the hands of a small elite.
sentences.cn: 权力主要集中在少数精英人物的手里。

sentences.en: It was an elite that believed its task was to enlighten the multitude.
sentences.cn: 精英人物都会认为自己的职责就是启迪群众。

sentences.en: A tiny, educated elite profited from the misery of their two million fellow countrymen.
sentences.cn: 一个小小的受过教育的精英团体从他们两百万同胞的穷困中获了利。
